FOREST.description: there's trees around you and a clearing in front of you

FRONTYARD.description: you are in the clearing in the middle of the woods, there is a house in front of you

BACKYARD.description: you are behind the house, there is a shed

SHED.description: you are surrounded by garden tools, there's a key hanging on a nail on the wall

itemDescriptions.STRANGE_KEY: It's an old, slightly rusty skeleton key
itemDescriptions.SHOVEL: It's an iron shovel with a wooden handle
